name: Armor of Magical Strength
desc: This armor has 6 charges. The wearer can expend the armor's charges in the following ways:
1. When the wearer makes a Strength check or a Strength saving throw, it can expend 1 charge to add a bonus to the roll equal to its Intelligence modifier.
2. If the creature would be knocked prone, it can use its reaction to expend 1 charge to avoid being knocked prone.
The armor regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn.
